Welcome Devine Moment

Nothing is standard. Nothing is normal. Like everything else this moment is unique. Reject nothing, despise nothing, all is god's. Welcome Devine Moment

Author: Chaim Finkelman

Sources: Mark Salzman Lying Awake Page 41, Billboard Advertising
